title: Podcast-Based Education for Customized Practical Mathematics Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical math problem-solving training using VR simulations in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems encountered in the workplace by listening to podcasts and applying a three-step process: problem identification, strategy development, and execution.
Learners can apply podcast content in a VR simulation environment to replicate real-world job scenarios with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can collaborate with peers to produce four or more practical application reports based on weekly podcast learning content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
